messages.message:
Curious to know if this might be something we’re thinking about: especially if we’re expanding to more verticals - similarly to how you can have user profiles in ChatGPT that help you get better responses. We could develop a feature allowing individual users to create personalised profiles and enabling Admins to create organisation-level profiles. Enhancing interactions based on individual roles and organisational context, including industry-specific terminology and phrases.

https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2495

Hmm interesting, I don't know if its on anyone's radar but will take a deeper look a the ticket and comment there.

cc: @avi + @Varun Jain

https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1285 this is something similar we're considering on a per chatbot basis, configured by admin. Sadly below the Q3 line :disappointed: we should also look into something at an org/user level too.
